activities: The company provides technology systems for the storage and processing of personal information about individuals who receive career related services from its affiliated Lee Hecht Harrison companies in the EU/EEA and Switzerland. The company also receives personal information about employees of its affiliated companies in the EU/EEA and Switzerland in order to provide compensation programs, group insurance and other terms and conditions that are coordinated for all the group of Lee Hecht Harrison companies.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: organization, client, customer, employee; data includes manually processed data
recoursemech: The company is committed to cooperate with data protection authorities in the EU (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) or their representatives.  The company also encourages data subjects to contact the company with any complaints and provides mechanisms for data subjects to access the company.
